body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes      There are no fees, tolls, or reservations for the Baltimore- Washington Parkway.       Please obey the rules and regulations on the parkway. There are no commercial vehicles allowed on the parkway.  People movers such as buses and limousines are allowed.The speed limit on the parkway is 55 mph unless otherwise posted.
title: Baltimore-Washington Parkway: Fees & Passes
